meanings.definition: The act of forming a fabric by looping yarn with needles.
meanings.sent1: My grandma enjoys knitting scarves for us during winter.
meanings.sent2: I learned knitting from a book and now I can make my own hats.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried knitting with a ball of yarn but got tangled up instead.
meanings.sent4: Her knitting of words wove a beautiful story that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic clicking of her knitting needles was soothing to listen to.

meanings.definition: The process of joining together closely.
meanings.sent1: The knitting of our team members helped us achieve our goal.
meanings.sent2: The knitting of different cultures in the city created a vibrant community.
meanings.sent3: The knitting of our schedules made it impossible to find a suitable time to meet.
meanings.sent4: The knitting of branches in the dense forest created a natural canopy above.
meanings.sent5: The knitting of friendship between the two neighbors was evident in their daily chats.
